column4: hello, I'm having a problem running vmware server 2.0 with ubuntu 8.0.4 hardy
I installed vmware, but the vmware server console doesnt show up under applications/system
you can add the item anywhere you please on the menu, it just doesnt make one
I did. and it brought up my browser, attempting to run the ssl. but failed.
theres a gui you can connect to vmware servers with
I got 3 firefox:4879 errors after I typed vmware &
what is the default login name/password for the gui?
for the localhost gui there isnt one
so you run the frontend using vmware &. Then select local host. then click ok
